job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Job Title : Software Engineer C++</p><p>Location: Salt Lake City , UT</p><p>Job Type: Contract</p><p><br></p><p>Job Description&nbsp;</p><p>Software Engineer -C++ Linux . Experience in Python, Shell scripting. Nice to have experience in Java, GWT, and QT.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Roles &amp; Responsibilities:&nbsp;</p><p>Participate in requirement analysis, design, coding, and testing (manual as well as automation)&nbsp;</p><p>Ability to understand/learn architecture and design of existing applications developed mainly using C++&nbsp;</p><p>Take ownership of assigned jobs that are part of new feature implementation, bugfixes and enhancement activities&nbsp;</p><p>Technical communication with internal/external stake holders and collaboration with global team will be part of job.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Required Skills (Technical Competency):&nbsp;</p><p>3-5 years of experience in design and development of C++ software applications and frameworks in Windows /Linux.&nbsp;</p><p>Experience in requirement analysis, design development, coding, code review and unit testing.&nbsp;</p><p>Hands on software development experience – strong C++ programming skills.&nbsp;</p><p>Experience in Object Oriented design and multi-threading methodologies.&nbsp;</p><p>Experience analysing, debugging issues with multi-threaded process using debugger&nbsp;</p><p>Ability to write effective and reusable code according to best practices&nbsp;</p><p>Experience inworking with Agile methodology in project execution&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Desired Skills:&nbsp;</p><p>Experience in Python, Shell scripting.&nbsp;</p><p>Nice to have experience in Java, GWT, and QT.&nbsp;</p><p>Familiar with Healthcare domain standard like DICOM and IHE.&nbsp;</p><p>Ability to explore large code base and understand architecture and design&nbsp;</p><p>Ability to deliver without much supervision from lead/managers&nbsp;</p><p>Familiar with tools like WinSCP, Eclipse, Putty, Rally, Collaborator, SVN, Git&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>If you are interested kindly apply through the below link:</p><p>https://bit.ly/3wCDEba</p><p><br></p><p>Recruiter Details:</p><p>Mohamed sheik</p><p>(302) 310-5458</p><p>sheikmd_us@falconsmartit.com</p><p><br></p><p>Find all current job openings at our Career Page</p><p>https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html</p><p><br></p><p>Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunities</p><p>https://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/</p>
